content: TE 700-AVR SDS-Max demolition hammer Powerful SDS Max (TE-Y) demolition hammer for heavy-duty chiseling in concrete and masonry, with Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Demolition hammers and breakers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Optimized performance to weight ratio for high productivity during wall demolition applications Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) makes the tool less tiring to use – helping to increase daily productivity The innovative brushless SR motor eliminates the need to change carbon brushes and extends the period between repairs Power reduction button for improved performance on brittle materials The optional DRS-B dust removal system collects up to 95% of dust Applications Heavy demolition on masonry and brick walls Removing plaster Removing tiles on walls and floors Breaking out window and door openings Bushing applications (i.e. roughening surfaces) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Working direction: Wall Tool chuck type: TE-Y (SDS Max) Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 17.4 lb. Technical Data | Working direction | Wall | Tool chuck type | TE-Y (SDS Max) | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 17.4 lb | Single impact energy | 8.5 ft-lbs | Full hammering frequency | 2760 impacts/minute | Max. chiseling performance | 73 in³/min | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 22.2 x 4.9 x 9.8 in | Triaxial vibration for chiseling into concrete | 6.9 m/s² | 1 | Dust removal system available | TE DRS-B | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 86 dB (A) | 2 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3484793 - TE 700-AVR Performance Pkg Mix - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 700-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE 700-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 2x Flat chisel TE-YX FM 36 - 2x Pointed chisel TE-YX SM 36 - 3856304 - TE 700-AVR Performance Pkg Flat - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 700-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE 700-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 4x Flat chisel TE-YX FM 36 - 3856305 - TE 700-AVR Performance Pkg Point - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 700-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE 700-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 4x Pointed chisel TE-YX SM 36 - 3856306 - TE 700-AVR Performance Pkg Scaling - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 700-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE 700-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 4x Scaling chisel TE-YX SC 28/8 - 428944 - Breaker TE 700-AVR - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 700-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE 700-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml
